attributes.action: Stop the Spice Girls from reforming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do we really have to tolerate a group of desperate, talentless,egotistical,media attention seekers for a second time? Plus they send the wrong message to the kids. Apart from Baby Spice, she's lovely. Please do what you can.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
